price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ má ṣe dà bí àwọn tó fi ìnira kan (Ànábì) Mūsā. Allāhu sì ṣàfọ̀mọ́ rẹ̀ nínú ohun tí wọ́n wí. Ó sì jẹ́ ẹni iyì lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاذَوۡاْ مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِمَّا قَالُواْۚ وَكَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَجِيهٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takūnū ka-alladhīna ādhaw mūsā fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimmā qālū wakāna ʿinda al-lahi wajīhan
